definition: a hand tool consisting of two rules that are hinged together so you can draw or measure angles of any size, to cut a bevel on
details:
noun
- a hand tool consisting of two rules that are hinged together so you can draw or measure angles of any size
= synonyms: bevel square
- two surfaces meeting at an angle different from 90 degrees
= synonyms: cant, chamfer
verb
- to cut a bevel on
= example: to cut a bevel on
= synonyms: chamfer
